Convert effectsize package output to tidyverse conventions

Source: R/helpers_easystats.R
tidy_model_effectsize.Rd

Convert effectsize package output to tidyverse conventions

tidy_model_effectsize(data)

Arguments

data

Dataframe returned by effectsize functions.

Examples

df <- effectsize::cohens_d(sleep$extra, sleep$group)
tidy_model_effectsize(df)

#> # A tibble: 1 x 5
#>   estimate conf.level conf.low conf.high effectsize
#>      <dbl>      <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl> <chr>     
#> 1   -0.832       0.95    -1.74    0.0955 Cohen's d
